title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 504.6 - Effective Date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 504.6 - Effective Date

State Regulations

This Part shall be effective January 1, 2017. Regulated

Institutions will be required to prepare and submit to the Superintendent

Annual Board Resolutions or Senior Officer(s) Compliance Findings under ยง
504.4
commencing April 15, 2018. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
504.6

Adopted

New

York State Register July 20, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 29, eff. 1/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
